allow:
Bash(git commit -m "feat: Complete Physical AI & Humanoid Robotics educational platform with unified frontend/backend

- Implement unified server running both frontend and backend on single port (8000)
- Add comprehensive educational content covering ROS2, Gazebo, Isaac Sim, and VLA systems
- Create RAG chatbot with Qdrant vector database for intelligent Q&A
- Implement authentication, personalization, and translation features
- Build interactive dashboard with progress tracking
- Add multilingual support (English/Urdu) with translation features
- Include interactive humanoid robot visualization
- Provide complete curriculum modules with code examples
- Set up Docusaurus-based documentation platform
- Integrate all components into cohesive educational experience")

Bash(git commit -m "chore: add Vercel configuration for unified server deployment

- Create vercel.json with proper build configuration for FastAPI
- Add api/index.py as Vercel entry point
- Update requirements.txt with all necessary dependencies
- Fix import paths for Vercel deployment compatibility")

Bash(git commit -m "fix: update cryptography dependency for Vercel Python 3.11 compatibility

- Change cryptography from fixed version 41.0.8 to >=41.0.0 for Python 3.11 compatibility
- Update Vercel runtime to Python 3.11 to ensure dependency compatibility
- Update both root and backend requirements.txt files")

Bash(git commit -m "chore: create Vercel-specific requirements to avoid ROS2 dependency conflicts

- Create vercel-requirements.txt with only FastAPI dependencies
- Update vercel.json to use custom install command with Vercel-specific requirements
- This resolves rclpy dependency issue in Vercel environment")

Bash(git commit -m "fix: update unified server for Vercel environment compatibility

- Add Vercel environment detection to handle deployment differences
- Skip static file mounting in Vercel environment to prevent crashes
- Return appropriate responses for root and catch-all routes in cloud environment
- Maintain API functionality while handling missing frontend build directory")

Bash(git commit -m "feat: update logo in navbar configuration

- Change logo from SVG to JPG format in navbar config
- Use new logo.jpg file from static/img directory
- Maintain alt text and other logo properties")
Bash(pip install langchain openai python-dotenv PyPDF2 tiktoken)
Bash(python -c "from langchain.text_splitter import RecursiveCharacterTextSplitter; print(''Import successful'')")
Bash(python -c "from langchain_text_splitters import RecursiveCharacterTextSplitter; print(''Import successful'')")
Bash(python -c "from main import app; print(''Application loaded successfully'')")

Bash(git commit -m "Add frontend Docusaurus documentation site for NeuralReader AI application

- Implement Docusaurus frontend with chatbot component
- Add user authentication context and chat interface
- Include UI components for chat bubbles and user interactions
- Set up proper configuration for the documentation site
- Integrate with the backend API endpoints")

Bash(git commit -m "Fix dependency conflict for Vercel deployment

- Update pydantic version to be compatible with langchain (>=2.7.4,<3.0.0)
- Update pydantic-settings to compatible version
- Update openai package version for compatibility")

Bash(git commit -m "Prepare project for Vercel deployment with strict checking

- Create dedicated Vercel entry point (vercel_api.py) to avoid runtime issues
- Update Vercel configuration to use proper entry point
- Ensure all dependencies are properly specified
- Maintain all NeuralReader AI features (RAG chat, translation, profiles, ingestion)")
Bash(git commit -m "Prepare project for new repository with Docusaurus book, frontend and backend")

Bash(git commit -m "Fix server crash by updating Vercel configuration

- Use production requirements file for more stable dependencies
- Ensure Python 3.11 runtime for Vercel compatibility
- Maintain all NeuralReader AI features")

Bash(git commit -m "Add MkDocs configuration for Humanoid Robotics Book documentation

- Add requirements-docs.txt for MkDocs dependencies
- Add mkdocs.yml configuration with Material theme
- Add vercel.json for static site deployment
- Configure navigation for Humanoid Robotics content")

Bash(git commit -m "Fix Vercel build for MkDocs static site

- Add MkDocs dependencies to requirements.txt
- Update mkdocs.yml to point to frontend/docs directory
- Update vercel.json to use modern configuration without builds array
- Configure proper build command for MkDocs site")

Bash(git commit -m "Fix MkDocs build command and add detailed config

- Update vercel.json to use python -m mkdocs build for proper execution
- Add detailed mkdocs.yml with Material theme configuration
- Configure navigation for Humanoid Robotics Book content
- Set docs_dir to frontend/docs where documentation files are located")

Bash(.specify/scripts/powershell/create-new-feature.ps1 -Json "# Frontend: Docusaurus 3 + React + Tailwind + Embedded Chatbot

Software Used:
- Docusaurus 3 (latest)
- React 18 + TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- shadcn/ui components
- @better-auth/react

Requirements:
- Floating chat bubble (bottom-right)
- When user selects text → auto-capture and send as context
- Every chapter has header with 3 buttons (if logged in):
  → ""Personalize for Me""
  → ""اردو میں ترجمہ""
  → Progress circle
- Global ChatBot component that talks to /api/chat" --number 1 --short-name "docusaurus-frontend")
Bash(python -c "import main; print(''Main module imported successfully'')")
Bash(pip install fastapi uvicorn sqlalchemy asyncpg langchain langchain-openai qdrant-client python-dotenv openai requests)
Bash(python -c "from main import app; print(''Backend imports successfully'')")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Implement Docusaurus 3 frontend with chatbot and FastAPI backend

- Implement Docusaurus 3 frontend with React, Tailwind CSS, and embedded chatbot
- Add floating chat bubble with text selection capture functionality
- Implement chapter header with personalization, translation, and progress features
- Create FastAPI backend with chat, translation, profile, and ingestion endpoints
- Configure Vercel deployment for Docusaurus site instead of MkDocs
- Add authentication with @better-auth/react
- Implement RAG functionality with Qdrant vector store
- Add Urdu translation capabilities
- Implement personalization engine
- Clean up duplicate and malformed project files

The project now has a complete educational platform with:
- Interactive chatbot with context awareness
- Text selection capture for contextual questions
- User authentication and profiles
- Content personalization
- Urdu translation support
- Progress tracking
- RAG-powered AI assistance

Refactor: Remove legacy MkDocs configuration and duplicate files

- Remove all duplicate frontend implementations that were cluttering the repo
- Clean up malformed directory structures
- Keep only the unified-site directory as the main project
- Update mkdocs.yml to indicate deprecation and migration to Docusaurus

EOF
)")

Bash(echo "# Module 1: ROS2

Welcome to the ROS2 module of the Physical AI & Humanoid Robotics Educational Platform.

## Chapters

- [Chapter 1: Architecture](./chapter-1-architecture)
- [Chapter 2: rclpy](./chapter-2-rclpy)
- [Chapter 3: Packages](./chapter-3-packages)
- [Chapter 4: URDF](./chapter-4-urdf)
- [Chapter 5: Control Loops](./chapter-5-control-loops)
- [Chapter 6: Jetson Deployment](./chapter-6-jetson-deployment)
")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
fix: Resolve context usage in auth pages during server-side rendering

- Update signin and signup pages to safely handle useAuth hook during SSR
- Replace useNavigate with safe navigation that works during build and runtime
- Add try/catch blocks for safe context access in auth pages
- Provide fallback navigation behavior for static site generation

This resolves the remaining build errors where Docusaurus was trying to statically 
render auth pages that used React contexts before they were available.
EOF
)")
